.ps-container .ps-scrollbar-y-rail {
  bottom: 0;
  opacity: 1;
}
.video-container .vdgm-sharebar {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  padding-right: .5rem;
}
.video-container .modal-control-active + .vdgm-sharebar {
  display: none;
}
video {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
.html-active video {
  left: 0px;
  position: relative;
}
#poster {
  display: block;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
#poster img {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
#poster #poster-container {
  width: 20rem;
  margin: auto;
  display: block;
  z-index: 220;
}
#poster #poster-container #html-poster-stop {
  display: none;
}
#poster #poster-container #html-poster-play {
  width: auto;
  display: block;
  text-align: center;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-top: -2.5rem;
  margin-left: -2.5rem;
}
#poster #poster-container #html-poster-play:before {
  color: #f1eff0;
  font-size: 5rem;
  font-family: 'vdgm_icons';
}
#poster #poster-container #html-poster-play:before:hover {
  color: #bd1300;
}
#liveBanner {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  padding: 5px 11px;
  position: relative;
  margin-top: -26px;
  color: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  margin-left: -30px;
  width: 100%;
  width: -webkit-calc( 100% + 60px );
  width: calc( 100% + 60px );
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  border-left: 0.4rem solid #bd1300;
}
#liveBanner p {
  width: 120px;
  background: #989c9d;
  color: white;
  font-size: 15px;
}
.no-touch #liveBanner:hover {
  background: rgba(34, 179, 172, 0.8);
  border-left: 0.4rem solid #ffffff;
}
.main-video {
  height: 0;
  padding-bottom: 56.25%;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}
#summary {
  display: none;
}
#description {
  display: block;
}
.main-video .video-modal,
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer-content,
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
}
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer-content.icon-play:before {
  font-size: 4rem;
  content: "\e60a";
  font-family: 'vdgm_icons';
  color: #f1eff0;
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 2000;
  top: 50%;
  margin: -1.5rem auto 0 auto;
  display: block;
  width: 4rem;
  height: 4rem;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -1.5rem;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer-content.icon-play {
  pointer-events: bounding-box;
}
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer-content.icon-play object {
  opacity: 0;
  position: absolute;
}
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer-content.icon-play .vdgm-icon-play {
  font-family: "vdgm_icons";
}
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer-content {
  -webkit-background-size: 100%;
  background-size: 100%;
  background-color: black;
}
.main-video .yui3-videoplayer-content object {
  opacity: 1;
}
#content-top-container {
  -webkit-box-sizing: content-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: content-box;
  box-sizing: content-box;
  position: relative;
}
#content-container.largesize {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: none;
  max-height: none;
  height: auto;
  padding-bottom: 0;
}
.largesize #content-top-container {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: none;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
.largesize .video-container {
  position: relative;
}
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-pause:before,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-facebook:before,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-twitter:before,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-share:before,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-spinner:before,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-stop:before,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-play:before {
  font-family: 'vdgm_icons';
}
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-pause:before:hover,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-facebook:before:hover,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-twitter:before:hover,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-share:before:hover,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-spinner:before:hover,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-stop:before:hover,
.no-touch #video-modal .icon-play:before:hover {
  color: #f1eff0;
}
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover .icon-pause:before,
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover .icon-facebook:before,
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover .icon-twitter:before,
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover .icon-share:before,
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover .icon-spinner:before,
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover .icon-stop:before,
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover .icon-play:before {
  font-family: 'vdgm_icons';
  color: #f1eff0;
}
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .video-control-button:hover {
  color: #f1eff0;
}
.no-touch #video-modal .vdgm-shareable span:hover:before {
  color: #f1eff0;
}
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .control:hover [data-icon] {
  color: #f1eff0;
}
.no-touch #video-modal #control-buttons .video-control-button:hover {
  color: #f1eff0;
}
.live #video-modal,
.archive #video-modal {
  height: 361px;
}
.main-video #video-modal {
  font-family: "franklin-gothic-urw-1", "franklin-gothic-urw-2";
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
  -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform;
  transition-property: transform;
  -webkit-transition-duration: .5s;
  transition-duration: .5s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: ease-in-out;
  transition-timing-function: ease-in-out;
  /* Safari */
  -webkit-transition-property: -webkit-transform;
  -webkit-transition-duration: .5s;
  -webkit-transition-timing-function: ease-in-out;
  width: 100%;
  opacity: 0;
  height: 0;
  padding-bottom: 56.25%;
  z-index: 49;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  display: none;
  margin: auto;
}
.main-video #video-modal.active {
  display: block;
  opacity: 1;
}
.main-video #video-modal .icon-play,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-stop,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-spinner {
  margin: 0px;
}
.main-video #video-modal .icon-play:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-stop:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-spinner:before {
  font-family: 'vdgm_icons';
  position: relative;
  float: left;
}
.main-video #video-modal .icon-spinner:before {
  margin-top: 2px;
}
.main-video #video-modal .icon-pause:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-facebook:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-twitter:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-pinterest:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-share:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-spinner:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-stop:before,
.main-video #video-modal .icon-play:before {
  margin: 0px 10px 0px 0px;
  padding: 0px;
  color: #bd1300;
  font-size: 4rem;
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: 'vdgm_icons';
}
.main-video #video-modal div#share-items {
  height: 100%;
  display: table-cell;
  vertical-align: middle;
  right: 50px;
}
.main-video #video-modal div#share-items div:last-child .icon-share {
  margin: 0;
}
.main-video #video-modal div#share-items div.vdgm-shareable {
  display: table-cell;
  vertical-align: middle;
  height: 100%;
}
.main-video #video-modal div#share-items.hide {
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal div#share-items p {
  color: #f1eff0;
  position: relative;
  display: table-cell;
  padding-right: 7px;
  vertical-align: middle;
  height: 100%;
}
.main-video #video-modal.no-share div#share-items {
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons {
  display: table-cell;
  vertical-align: middle;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
}
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons .control {
  display: table-cell;
  position: relative;
  top: 0px;
  left: 0px;
  height: 100%;
  margin-right: 0px;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons .control #next-video-control {
  font-family: "franklin-gothic-urw-1", "franklin-gothic-urw-2";
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: white;
}
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons .control p {
  font-size: 20px;
  color: #f1eff0;
  font-weight: 200;
  margin: 1px 0 0  30px;
  width: 200px;
}
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons .video-control-button #close-video-control,
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons .video-control-button #play-video-control {
  cursor: pointer;
  background-color: transparent;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  border: none;
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  /*padding: 10px 0px 0px 39px;*/
  text-transform: uppercase;
  margin-right: 0px;
}
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons .video-control-button #close-video-control [data-icon],
.main-video #video-modal #control-buttons .video-control-button #play-video-control [data-icon] {
  padding: 0 15px 0 0;
  font-size: 20px;
}
.main-video #video-modal.no-stop #control-buttons .video-control-button#close-video-control {
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal.video_paused .video-paused {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  left: 1.2rem;
  top: 3.6rem;
  width: 50%;
  height: 0;
  padding-bottom: 28.125%;
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 2px black, 0 0 1rem black;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.main-video #video-modal.video_paused .video-paused .video-headline {
  position: absolute;
  display: block;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  text-align: center;
}
.main-video #video-modal.video_paused #close-video-control {
  display: block;
}
.main-video #video-modal.video_ended .related-videos-headline {
  display: table;
}
.main-video #video-modal.video_ended .related-videos-headline.hide {
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal.video_ended #video-timer-message {
  display: table;
}
.main-video #video-modal .video-paused {
  position: relative;
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal .video-paused:before {
  color: #bd1300;
}
.main-video #video-modal .icon-pause:before {
  color: #bd1300;
  vertical-align: middle;
  top: 50%;
  position: absolute;
  margin-top: -1rem;
  margin-left: -2rem;
  left: 50%;
}
.main-video #video-modal .video-headline {
  width: intrinsic;
  width: -max-content;
  position: relative;
  display: inline-table;
  color: #f1eff0;
}
.main-video #video-modal .related-videos-headline {
  font-family: "franklin-gothic-urw-1", "franklin-gothic-urw-2";
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
  left: -webkit-calc(50% + 3.6rem);
  left: calc(50% + 3.6rem);
  top: 1.2rem;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  width: 50%;
  position: absolute;
}
.main-video #video-modal .related-videos-headline.hide {
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal .now-playing {
  left: 1.2rem;
  top: 1.2rem;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  width: 41.1%;
  max-width: 385px;
  position: absolute;
  font-family: "franklin-gothic-urw-1", "franklin-gothic-urw-2";
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}
.main-video #video-modal #video-timer-message {
  position: relative;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  margin: 30px 0 0 12px;
  width: auto;
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal #video-timer-message p {
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #bd1300;
  margin-left: 10px;
}
.main-video #video-modal #video-timer-message span {
  font-weight: 700;
  color: white;
}
.main-video #video-modal.no-stop.video_paused #close-video-control {
  display: none;
}
.main-video #video-modal.no-share.video_paused #share-items {
  display: none;
}
.largesize #video-modal {
  width: 100%;
  height: 0;
  margin-left: 0px;
  left: initial;
  padding-bottom: 59.4%;
}
.largesize #video-modal ul.related-videos {
  height: 100%;
}
div#related-video-container {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0px;
  top: 0;
  width: 200px;
  right: 0;
}
.yui3-scrollview {
  top: 0px;
  right: 0px;
  display: block;
  position: absolute !important;
}
ul.related-videos {
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  left: -webkit-calc(50% + 3.6rem);
  left: calc(50% + 3.6rem);
  top: 3.6rem;
  bottom: 1.2rem;
  overflow: hidden;
  max-width: 39.1%;
  list-style-type: none;
  margin: 0px;
  padding-left: 0;
  padding-top: 0px;
}
ul.related-videos li {
  margin: 0 0 1.2rem;
}
ul.related-videos li:last-of-type {
  margin: 0;
}
ul.related-videos a:hover .list-item-image img {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(0) contrast(100%);
  filter: grayscale(0) contrast(100%);
}
ul.related-videos .list-item-image {
  position: relative;
  width: -webkit-calc(100% - 20px);
  width: calc(100% - 20px);
}
ul.related-videos .list-item-image p {
  font-family: "franklin-gothic-urw-1", "franklin-gothic-urw-2";
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #f1eff0;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 1rem;
  left: 1rem;
  right: 1rem;
  text-shadow: 1px 2px 1px black, 0 0 1rem black;
}
ul.related-videos .list-item-image img {
  -webkit-filter: grayscale(1) contrast(150%);
  filter: grayscale(1) contrast(150%);
  -webkit-transition: 0.5s ease-out;
  transition: 0.5s ease-out;
  width: 100%;
}
div#video-modal-control {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 1.2rem;
  left: 1.2rem;
  width: 50%;
  height: 0;
  display: block;
  z-index: 5;
}
.video-control-button {
  cursor: pointer;
}
.main-video.modal-control-active {
  background: black;
}
.main-video.modal-control-active .yui3-videoplayer {
  bottom: initial;
  height: 0;
  left: 1.2rem;
  padding-bottom: 28.175%;
  top: 3.6rem;
  width: 50%;
}
.main-video.modal-control-active .yui3-videoplayer-content {
  text-shadow: 2px 2px 2px black, 0 0 1rem black;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.main-video #video-modal #video-timer-message.hide {
  display: none;
}
.hide {
  display: none;
}
@media (min-width: 992px) {
  ul.related-videos {
    max-width: 39.1%;
  }
  ul.related-videos .list-item-image p {
    font-size: 12px;
    font-weight: 700;
    bottom: 0.1rem;
  }
  .main-video.modal-control-active .yui3-videoplayer {
    padding-bottom: 28.175%;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1200px) {
  ul.related-videos .list-item-image p {
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: 700;
  }
}
